#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>

using namespace std;

#define maxn 1009

string s1,s2;
int len1,len2;
int memo[maxn][maxn];

int func(int ind1 , int ind2)
{
	if(ind1>=len1 && ind2 >= len2)	
	return 0;
	else if(ind1>=len1 && ind2!=len2)
	return len2-ind2;
	else if(ind1 !=len1 && ind2 >= len2)
	return len1-ind1;

	int &value = memo[ind1][ind2];
	if(value != -1)
	return value;
	
	value = 0;
	
	if(s1[ind1]==s2[ind2])
	value = func(ind1+1,ind2+1)+1;
	else
	value = min(func(ind1+1,ind2),func(ind1,ind2+1))+1;
	return value;
} 

int main()
{
	int tc;
	cin>>tc;
	int t=1;
	while(tc--)
	{
		cin>>len1>>len2;
		cin>>s1>>s2;
		//len1 = s1.length();
		//len2 = s2.length();
		for(int i=0;i<maxn;i++)
			for(int j=0;j<maxn;j++)
				memo[i][j]=-1;
		int ans = func(0,0);
		printf("Case %d: %d\n",t,ans);
		t++;
	}
	return 0;
}
